backingBrush.description: Gets or sets the brush to use to fill the backing of the bullet graph.

width.description: The width of the BulletGraph. It can be set as a number in pixels, string (px) or percentage (%).

height.description: The height of the BulletGraph. It can be set as a number in pixels, string (px) or percentage (%).

backingInnerExtent.description: Gets or sets the inner extent of the bullet graph backing.

backingOuterExtent.description: Gets or sets the outer extent of the bullet graph backing.

backingOutline.description: Gets or sets the brush to use for the outline of the backing.

backingStrokeThickness.description: Gets or sets the stroke thickness of the backing outline.

fontBrush.description: Gets or sets the brush to use for the label font.

interval.description: Gets or sets the interval to use for the scale.

isScaleInverted.description:
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the scale is inverted.
 When the scale is inverted the direction in which the scale values increase is right to left.

labelExtent.description:
Gets or sets the position at which to put the labels as a value from 0 to 1, measured from the bottom of the scale.
 Values further from zero than 1 can be used to hide the labels of the bullet graph.

labelInterval.description: Gets or sets the interval to use for rendering labels. This defaults to be the same interval as the tickmarks on the scale.

labelsPostInitial.description: A value to start adding labels, added to the scale's MinimumValue.

labelsPreTerminal.description: A value to stop adding labels, subtracted from the scale's MaximumValue.

maximumValue.description: Gets or sets the maximum value of the scale.

minimumValue.description: Gets or sets the minimum value of the scale.

minorTickBrush.description: Gets or sets the brush to use for the minor tickmarks.

minorTickCount.description: Gets or sets the number of minor tickmarks to place between major tickmarks.

minorTickEndExtent.description:
Gets or sets the position at which to stop rendering the minor tickmarks as a value from 0 to 1, measured from the front/bottom of the bullet graph.
 Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal size of the bullet graph.

minorTickStartExtent.description:
Gets or sets the position at which to start rendering the minor tickmarks as a value from 0 to 1, measured from the front/bottom of the bullet graph.
 Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal size of the bullet graph.

minorTickStrokeThickness.description: Gets or sets the stroke thickness to use when rendering minor ticks.

orientation.description: Gets or sets the orientation of the scale.

valueOptions.name: horizontal
valueOptions.description: Gets or sets the orientation of the scale to horizontal

valueOptions.name: vertical
valueOptions.description: Get or sets the orientation of the scale to vertical

rangeBrushes.description:
Gets or sets a collection of brushes to be used as the palette for bullet graph ranges.
 The value provided should be an array of css color strings or JavaScript objects defining gradients. Optionally the first element can be a string reading "RGB" or "HSV" to specify the interpolation mode of the collection.

rangeInnerExtent.description:
Gets or sets the position at which to start rendering the ranges, measured from the front/bottom of the control as a value from 0 to 1.
 Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal size of the bullet graph.

rangeOuterExtent.description:
Gets or sets the position at which to stop rendering the range as a value from 0 to 1 measured from the front/bottom of the bullet graph.
 Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal size of the bullet graph.

rangeOutlines.description:
Gets or sets a collection of brushes to be used as the palette for bullet graph outlines.
 The value provided should be an array of css color strings or JavaScript objects defining gradients. Optionally the first element can be a string reading "RGB" or "HSV" to specify the interpolation mode of the collection.

ranges.description: Gets or sets the scale ranges to render on the bullet graph.

startValue.description: The start value of the range

endValue.description: The end value of the range

brush.description: Gets or sets the brush for the entire range.

startExtent.description: Gets or sets the starting value of the extent of the range.

endExtent.description: Gets or sets the ending value of the extent of the range.

outline.description: Gets or sets the brush for the outline of the range.

remove.description: Gets or sets the flag used to determine if the range should be removed. If set to true, the range (if existing) is removed.

strokeThickness.description: Gets or sets the thickness of the range outline.

rangeToolTipTemplate.description: Gets or sets the ranges' tooltip template.

scaleEndExtent.description:
Gets or sets the position at which to stop rendering the scale as a value from 0 to 1, measured from the front/bottom of the bullet graph.
 Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal size of the bullet graph.

scaleStartExtent.description:
Gets or sets the position at which to start rendering the scale, measured from the front/bottom of the bullet graph as a value from 0 to 1.
 Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal size of the bullet graph.

showToolTip.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether tooltips are enabled.

showToolTipTimeout.description: Gets or sets the time in milliseconds that tooltip appearance is delayed with.

targetValue.description: Gets or sets the value indicated by the target value bar.

targetValueBreadth.description: Get or sets the breadth of the target value element.

targetValueBrush.description: Gets or sets the brush to use when rendering the fill of the comparative marker.

targetValueInnerExtent.description:
Gets or sets the position at which to start rendering the target value, measured from the front/bottom of the control as a value from 0 to 1.
 Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal size of the bullet graph.

targetValueName.description: Gets or sets the name used for the target value. The name is displayed in the default target value tooltip.

targetValueOuterExtent.description:
Gets or sets the position at which to start rendering the target value, measured from the front/bottom of the control as a value from 0 to 1.
 Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal size of the bullet graph.

targetValueOutline.description: Gets or sets the brush to use when rendering the outline of the target value.

targetValueStrokeThickness.description: Gets or sets the stroke thickness of the outline of the target value bar.

targetValueToolTipTemplate.description: Gets or sets the target value's tooltip template.

tickBrush.description: Gets or sets the brush to use for the major tickmarks.

tickEndExtent.description:
Gets or sets the position at which to stop rendering the major tickmarks as a value from 0 to 1, measured from the front/bottom of the bullet graph.
 Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal size of the bullet graph.

ticksPostInitial.description: A value to start adding tickmarks, added to the scale's MinimumValue.

ticksPreTerminal.description: A value to stop adding tickmarks, subtracted from the scale's MaximumValue.

tickStartExtent.description:
Gets or sets the position at which to start rendering the major tickmarks as a value from 0 to 1, measured from the front/bottom of the bullet graph.
 Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal size of the bullet graph.

tickStrokeThickness.description: Gets or sets the stroke thickness to use when rendering ticks.

transitionDuration.description: Gets or sets the number of milliseconds over which changes to the bullet graph should be animated.

value.description: Gets or sets the value at which the bar ends.

valueBrush.description: Gets or sets the brush to use for the actual value element.

valueInnerExtent.description:
Gets or sets the position at which to start rendering the actual value geometries, measured from the front/bottom of the bullet graph as a value from 0 to 1.
 Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal size of the bullet graph.

valueName.description: Gets or sets the name used for actual value.

valueOuterExtent.description:
Gets or sets the position at which to stop rendering the actual value geometries as a value from 0 to 1 measured from the front/bottom of the bullet graph.
 Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal size of the bullet graph.

valueOutline.description: Gets or sets the brush to use for the outline of actual value element.

valueStrokeThickness.description: Gets or sets the stroke thickness to use when rendering single actual value element.

valueToolTipTemplate.description: Gets or sets the value's tooltip template.
